title: Spray Wet Dry Mops for Floor Cleaning - MEXERRIS Microfiber Hardwood Floor Mop with Spray Dust Mop with 4x Washable Reusbale Pads 2x Bottles Flat Mops for Laminate Wood Ceramic Tiles Hardwood
features: 【FOUR Reusable Replacement Mop Pads 】Spray mops come with 4 of the microfibre cloths, you never have to worry about them being clean or dirty when you need to use mop pads. If one of mop pads is the wash then you can just put a clean one on and be able to reuse the mop pads and wash them as needed. Our mop pads have millions of microscopic fibers, which are super absorbent and can effectively grab dirt, dust, and hair, which is good helper in cleaning floors.

【Two Refillable Bottles, Cleaning Solution Options】Our wet mops for floor cleaning came with two bottles, can fill with your own cleaning solutions. You can have one filled with a major brand floor cleaner for wood floors and fill the other one with something for tile floors, and don't have to worry about wasting any of the solution. So instead of having to buy by refills, put whatever you want in these bottles, except strong acid /boiling water.

【One Hand Operation, Easy To Install】Spray mop just click together and wait for the click the final part just line up the holes to hear a click ,then complete assembly. You just pop the handle and it sprays water up. The sprayer comes out the nice fine mist and you are able to really easily clean floor, easy to use, efficient, no batteries necessary, no heavy lifting. Microfiber mop that simple picks up everything on all sorts of floors from hardwood tile marble laminate Ceramic.

【Upgrade spray mop function】You will Love 360 swivel head on microfiber mop just makes it really easy to get into all the corners underneath things and because this microfiber cloth is so soft and will not damage surfaces; Upgrade velcro design, the pads do attached to the mop base with this hook and loop so they just kind of snap right on their very secure and their not going anywhere. Another feature about this mop that is the ability to use mop on other surfaces such as walls and ceilings.

【No blend over, Easy storage 】 Wet mop has a cushion handle so you can hang on and will not take up much space but a little strip on your wall. Our mops are lightweight and easy to use, so it's not hurt your hands or gives you tendonitis or anything.If you need a new mop and you don't have to blend over or use the bucket or anything like that,or looking for a microfiber spray mop that comes with four washable mop heads and two refillbale bottles,you can have a try Mexerris Mop.

【Buy with Confidence】: We’d love hear from you about our product, Regardless of positive side or negative side, we are working on doing it better! If you are not fully satisfied. Please don’t hesitate to contact us if you need help.[Small Tip: ①Each spray mop has be spray function tested before sent,a small amount of water may remain in bottle is normal phenomenon.②Please clean the water tank and spray nozzle of the floor mop after use to keep it clean and protected.

【MEXERRIS Tips】:③Please don't fill boiling or impurity water, strong acid,alkali detergent into the bottle of the wet mop.④Please fully dilute solutions with plain water,because concentrated solutions may corrode mop internal parts or some floor types. ⑤ There are two small silicone plugs on the bottle cap of our spray mop. Please be careful not to lose them when cleaning the bottle to prevent the bottle from leaking.
description: Product Description SPRAY MOP SYSTEM WITH 2 BOTTLES & 4 MOP PADS REPLACEMENT MEXERRIS Microfibre Spray Mops for Floor Cleaning-Clean Solution Expert Long-Lasting mops for floor cleaning: The reinforced response trigger ensures that every stroke leaves behind a streak-free shine on any surface. Nice Feel Microfiber Mops for Floor Cleaning: A fantastic option for keeping those wood and laminate floors scratch-free.A fantastic option for keeping those wood and laminate floors scratch-free. High Versatility Wet Mops for Floor Cleaning : The hygienic wet cloths trap dirt and grime effectively, keep your floors sparkly clean.The hygienic wet cloths trap dirt and grime effectively, keep your floors sparkly clean. Space Miracle Microfiber Spray Floor Mop: Equipped with an easy carry handle and balance design, this floor mop is suitable for large and small spaces. MEXERRIS Microfibre Floor Mop Flat Dry Wet Mop for Hard Wood Laminate Vinyl Tile Wooden Floor Cleaning What You Will Like The MEXERRIS Professional Microfiber Spray Floor Mop We specialize in the field of household cleaning, providing high quality spray mops,floor mop,microfiber mop, mop pads replacement, so that you can effectively and easily complete household cleaning works! Our reusable mop pads are made of microfiber, a unique polyester and nylon blend that’s known for its impressive absorbency. The towel-like texture of the microfiber pads kicks up dirt and holds onto it, leaving your floor cleaner. Microfiber pads are also save money and protect environment because you can wash and reuse them. You’ll get 4 replacement mop pads and 2 refillable water tank with this spray mop, all of which are washable and reusable. A responsive trigger, sealed water reservoir and a 360-degree rotating washable mop head make this mop a top choice. The mop is safe to use on tile, wood, hardwood and laminate flooring. MICROFIBRE SPRAY MOP FOR FLOORS INSTALLATION TIPS MEXERRIS Spray Mop & Floor Mop Size Hardwood Mop Spray Floor Mop Tips When washing your mop heads be sure to not use any detergent or fabric softener. Washing them in just water helps your mop head last longer. For homes with hardwood, vinyl, or tile floors, MEXERRIS spray floor mop for floor cleaning is an essential cleaning accessory to have on hand. It’s a gentle cleaning device that utilizes homemade dilute solutions instead of harsh chemical cleaners, and the microfiber pad is safe for all types of floors. Spray mops are definitely the way forward, especially if you’re looking for protecting environment, compact cleaning accessory. Package Included: 1 × Ergonomic handle; 1 × Aluminum alloy pole; 2 × 410ml Refillable bottle; 1 × Spray nozzle module with connector; 1 × 360° Rotating flat mop head; 4 × Reusable microfibre mop pads; 1 × Practical Scraper. 2 SPRAY MOP REFILLABLE BOTTLE Leave the heavy messy bucket alone-Microfiber mops for floor cleaning coming with 2 wood floor mop refillable water tank, you can add water or your favorite cleaner to mopping your hardwood, wood, vinyl, ceramic, concrete, tile, laminate wood, floors and etc.. Upgraded Floor Mop Sprayer The upgraded water spray nozzle sprays an even mist of water to protect your floor without leaving too much water stain on it. Multifunctional Practical Scraper Hardwood Floor MOP come with a scraper, can be used to scrape hair and dirt off from microfibre cloth, what's more? The flat edge can also scrapes excess water built up on cloth after mopping and tough dirt on floor MEXERRIS Dust Mops for Floor Cleaning Suitable for All Kind of Floors Microfiber Mop /Hardwood Floor Mop FAQ Q.Can you store the cleaner in the tank when not in use? A. Please clean the water bottle and spray nozzle of the spray mop for cleaner after use. Q. Can I make my own cleaning solution for my spray mop? A. Yes, and many people do. In fact, it’s recommended that you create a dilute solution with plenty of water. Harsher solutions could damage internal parts of the mop and very strong concentrations can be too abrasive for some floors. Q. There is a small amount of water in the floor mop with spray, does it used? A. If there is a small amount of water in the spray mop bottle of the wet mop when you got it, please do not worry, that's because every spray mop set will be tested by our factory before sent to you. Q. Can more microfiber pads be purchased for MEXERRIS microfiber spray mop for floors? A. You can search the keywords"MEXERRIS Microfiber Spray Mop Pads Replacement" on amazon. Q. Can more Spray floor mop bottle be purchased for this floor mop with spray for cleaning ? A. yes, you can do an Amazon search (search keywords" MEXERRIS 410ML Replacement Bottle for Spray Mop")for the mop. Q. Does the sprayer allow for several sprays in a row? A.It’s a pull trigger system like a spray bottle. You can pull And spray as much and you’d like. Q. How do you fill the bottle with cleaning solution? A.You can just pull the solution container out and it pops out. It is held in place by a rubber O ring. Then you can unscrew the top of the bottle cap and fill it than push/pop it back in.
